line_1: Not her, among the batter'd lasses,
line_2: Such as our friend Toupét caresses,

line_1: To drink to their King, to their country and lasses;
line_2: The gentlemen fill'd up the sparkling glasses,

line_1: Now cease to contend, my dear lasses,
line_2: Nor yet can I tell which surpasses,

line_1: Five deep, He toasts the tow'ring Lasses;
line_2: Repeats you Verses wrote on Glasses;
As saft as ony flesh is.
